2101850.name: Cosmic Companions
2101850.description:
Cosmic Companions is a "cozy/life simulator", in which you are an astronaut traveling the vast and unknown universe to explore new worlds and befriending aliens.

- Find new and strange worlds, land with your dropship, and explore alien vegetation and animal life.

- Make first contact with aliens, be social if you want to.

- Get funds from earth for creating a cosmic community.

- Use your funds for better engines that moves you quicker to the next planet, and more.

- It´s a game designed not to be played in one go, so set a course for the next world. It can take hours to reach it.
